title: Better
lyrics: Our love has changed It's not the same And the only way to say it Is say it It's better----- --pause I can't con ceal This way I feel For all the times we've spent together Fore ver Just gets better---- -- See what I'm trying to say is You make things Bett er And no matter what the day is With you here It's bet ter---- --pause (use CHORUS I chords except last line chords) It's b etter Oh t he m ore I tal k t o yo u I fa ll i n lo ve w ith E veryth ing y ou do---
